data.text: Every thing was Excellent how ever we must have Karak Tea in the hotel for customers coming from India , Ghofrane was really Nice to me and Histi was very courteous and friendly, they must be promoted . I would surely recommend my friends and family
data.title: Experience was really fantastic people in the hotel right from Reception to house keep and all the managers were Good.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for your recent feedback regarding your stay at Grand Millennium Business Bay!

We are pleased to hear that you had an excellent experience overall.
We also appreciate your suggestion about offering Karak Tea. Your feedback is invaluable, and we will definitely explore ways to enhance our services to better cater to our diverse guests.
We are delighted that you had positive interactions with Ghofrane and Histi. They will be commended for their exceptional service, and we are grateful for you recognizing their courteous and friendly demeanor.

Thank you for recommending us to your friends and family. We look forward to welcoming them and you back to our hotel in the future!

Best regards,
Aizhamal Zhekshenova
Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.author: Aizhamal Zhekshenova

data.text:
My sister and I stayed at the Grand Millennium for 2 nights before heading to the Seychelles. The service was outstanding from the minute we were picked up from the airport until we were dropped off at the airport. The staff at the Grand Millennium go way beyond the call of duty to make your stay the very best it can be. They are incredibly friendly, helpful and professional. We had chauffer service from the airport to the hotel and from the hotel back to the airport. We also had a chauffer take us to Abu Dhabi for the day. Everything went very smoothly. 

Our rooms were upgraded. Both rooms were spacious, the beds were very comfortable and there was plenty of lounging space (work desk/chair and chairs/table). The bathrooms were spacious as well.

My sister and I thought the buffet breakfast was great. There was a lot of food choices (both hot and cold). We had dinner at Asia Asia which was good too. It was a nice atmosphere by the river. We also ordered room service one night which was fast and great.

I would definitely stay there again!
data.title: Outstanding hospitality!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Kitty32655,

Thank you very much for sharing your experience of your recent stay at Grand Millennium Business Bay! 

We are delighted to learn that you and your sister had a fantastic time with us before your journey to the Seychelles. 
We greatly appreciate your kind words about our exceptional service. Ensuring our guests feel well cared for and valued is a top priority, and it's wonderful to hear that our team exceeded your expectations with their friendly and professional assistance.
It is also fantastic that you enjoyed the convenience of our 10 hours chauffeur services, including the trip to Abu Dhabi, and that everything went smoothly for you.
We are thrilled that you found your upgraded rooms spacious and comfortable, with plenty of amenities to enhance your stay.
Your positive feedback about the buffet breakfast, dining experience at Asia Asia, and room service is truly appreciated. We strive to offer a variety of delicious options and prompt service to ensure a delightful culinary experience for our guests.

Thank you for considering us for your future stays in Dubai and we eagerly look forward to providing another exceptional experience!

Best regards,
Aizhamal Zhekshenova
Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.author: Aizhamal Zhekshenova

data.text:
Excellent service, brilliant facilities. 
Accomdation was very clean.

Great location.
First time staying with family in the grand millennium and will definitely be returning back.

data.text: Excellent 5-star hotel in Dubai, located in one of the best areas - Business Bay. Perfect if you are coming by car - excellent valet services and ample parking space. All the staff was friendly, attentive, polite and helpful, and went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable. The services are great (e.g., We used the laundry service which was reasonably priced and timely, or the reception was always helpful with anything we needed). Hotel itself is new, very modern and tastefully decorated, with large lobby spaces to hangout. Room had a view of the bay and Burj Khalifa. Room was very spacious, clean and well equipped. Amenities include chairs, tables, desk, windows with sun blinds, smart TV, powerful air-conditioning, mirror, plenty of closet space with hangers, safe, fridge, tea kettle, tea & coffee, USB charging sockets and lamps on both sides of the bed, great lighting, fast Wi-Fi, iron, shoe horn, hair dryer, and essentials like towels, shampoo, shower gel, etc. Bed and blankets were large. Mattress was very comfortable (also for people with back problems). Bathroom was spacious, well-designed and clean, with a bathtub, walk-in shower, bidet, toilet and vanity mirror. Breakfast was just delicious, with every variety of food imaginable. Staff was attentive and careful about allergies and special dietary requirements. Hotel has four in-house restaurants and a bar to choose from, all of which are excellent. One of the restaurants has their own sheesha place with excellent sheeshas and service. Hotel has a decent swimming pool with a life guard on duty and a pool-side bar with nice views. Spa (includes jacuzzi, steam, sauna, etc.) was well-maintained and massage services were excellent. In general, one of the best hotels we have ever stayed in! The only negatives: Fridge was not cooling enough. Location of hotel is difficult to reach by public transportation (e.g., metro).
data.title: 5-star hotel in Dubai beyond expectations. Top service, staff and food.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Pancholi,

Thank you for sharing your wonderful detailed experience of your stay at Grand Millennium Business Bay! 

We are delighted to hear that you found every aspect of your stay to be exceptional. And we are thrilled to hear that you found our prime location, top-notch valet services, and plentiful parking facilities to your liking. Our team takes great pride in providing friendly, attentive, and helpful service, and we're happy to hear that they exceeded your expectations.
We are pleased that you found the contemporary and elegantly designed ambiance of our hotel to your liking, complemented by the spacious and fully equipped rooms offering mesmerizing vistas of the bay and the iconic Burj Khalifa.
We are also glad you appreciated the breadth and upkeep of our amenities, spanning from our diverse dining choices to the tranquil poolside and spa offerings. 
On another hand, we appreciate your feedback regarding the fridge cooling matter,  we will take immediate actions to address these area for enhancement.

Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay in the future!

Best regards,
Aizhamal Zhekshenova
Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.author: Aizhamal Zhekshenova
